I want to work alongside people who share my values and are open to new ideas and innovation.

professional_experience.title: Economist
professional_experience.industry: Health / Administration of Hospitals and Medical Services Bucharest
professional_experience.company: Dr. Victor Babeș Infectious Diseases and Tropical Hospital
responsibilities: Preparing proposals for the investment and capital repair plan for properties in use
Developing the annual public procurement plan by proposing purchases and equipment related to the unit's administrative activities
Managing lease contracts for properties owned or administered by the unit; creating monthly reports
Organizing cleaning in all activity sectors
Ensuring timely acquisition of all necessary permits for the proper functioning of the unit and keeping a strict record of the validity periods of existing permits
Determining the need for products to ensure proper management of assets, ensuring timely compliance with the procurement plan
Ensuring quality control and acceptance of repairs and maintenance products performed
Keeping records of medical and non-medical equipment and machinery
Keeping records of the vehicle fleet by creating travel sheets, monitoring inspection dates, insurances, and the proper functioning of vehicles owned by the hospital
